name: KURT - DER FUSSBALLMANAGER
description:
LAST GENERATION MANAGEMENT!
KURT ´99 - THE FOOTBALL MANAGER [/]

The pioneers of soccer simulation games created one of their masterpieces with KURT.

Beginners and professionals alike will be amazed by the ease of use and realistic game scenes. Game depth and fun are guaranteed! Kurt puts the focus back on football.

4: 3 RESOLUTION [/]

Like back in `99: The 4: 3 resolution will continue to accompany us in the future 😊

LIVE GAME SCENES CALCULATION [/]

KURT calculates every game movement "live". Your settings immediately affect the gameplay.

UNIQUE OPERATION [/]

KURT has intelligent user guidance that adapts to the manager. If you don't know what to do, KURT explains almost every detail on the screen.

ABSOLUTELY FLEXIBLE GAME SYSTEM [/]

Homemade league system, own club crest, changed player heads  with the editor you can change and adapt everything.

INTELLIGENT ASSISTANTS [/]

Tired of taking every setting yourself? No problem - just hire an assistant. He is happy to take care of the various tasks.
